mapper.sql:
insert into kv_vendor_invoices ( id, tenant_id, import_id, account_id, invoice_date,
invoice_description, invoice_due_date, invoice_amount, invoice_outstanding, dpd, mpd, status_id, created_at, updated_at, created_by, updated_by, invoice_status_id, invoice_outstanding_with_interest, gst, import_status_id, import_note, branch_id, branch_code, in_aging, invoice_pic_code, invoice_pic_name, last_listener_run,
vendor_no, tax_code, tax_id, clearing_doc, reference, assignment, document_id, business_area_id, tax_amount,
document_no, mode, amount_dc, amount_lc, purchase_order_no, gst_code, portal_status_id, cheque_no, currency_code, document_status_id, invoice_outstanding_dc, entered_date, transaction_date, payment_term, baseline_date, cleardoc_id, reference_id, alt_payee, item_no, alternate_payee2, load_id, invoice_no, line_of_business, payment_reference
)
